items.title: Important Shuttle Updates: Monday, 6/3 and Weds., 6/5
items.description:
MON., JUNE 3rd (RED/ODD DAY) IS MARSHALL HIGH SCHOOL'S GRADUATION.

THERE ARE NO ACADEMY CLASSES HELD OR SHUTTLES PROVIDED THAT DAY.

 

WEDS., JUNE 5th (RED/ODD) IS THE LAST DAY FOR MARSHALL ACADEMY SHUTTLES.

THE LAST DAY OF CLASSES FOR FEEDER STUDENT...
